task.description: Document core app functionality and map potential feature evolution using insights from state and document prompts

requirements.requirement: Review recent state analysis and documentation for context
Brainstorm innovative features and tooling ideas
Highlight UI/UX improvements that could enhance the product
Sketch roadmaps showing how concepts might evolve
Capture open questions and vision notes for future planning

instructions.instruction: Absorb key themes from recent repo status entries
Note any surprising connections or metaphors

phase.output: List of raw concept fragments and emotional tones

instructions.instruction: Group related fragments into rough feature ideas
Consider how each idea could improve user experience
Describe the essence of each idea in a short paragraph
Sketch possible milestones or iterations for promising ideas
Identify open questions and assumptions for future research

phase.output: Loose roadmaps and question lists for further exploration

primary_deliverable.content: Snapshot of current functionality and future concepts

guideline.name: Playful Exploration
guideline.guidance: Embrace creativity and avoid early judgment of ideas

guideline.name: User Grounding
guideline.guidance: Tie imaginative concepts back to real user needs

guideline.name: Current App Awareness
guideline.guidance: Describe today's functionality before sketching new ideas

guideline.name: Iterative Vision
guideline.guidance: Capture directions that can evolve alongside the project
